Introduction

XIA (Kim Junsu) is a South Korean singer, musical actor, and entrepreneur known for his powerful vocals and commanding stage presence. Debuting as the main vocalist of TVXQ in 2003 and later as a member of JYJ, he has built a successful solo career since 2012, releasing multiple acclaimed albums across various genres. Beyond his music, XIA has made a name for himself in the musical theatre industry, starring in productions such as Mozart!, Elisabeth, and Dracula. In 2021, he established his own agency, PALMTREE ISLAND, where he serves as CEO, managing both his career and other musical actors. With his unwavering passion for music and theatre, XIA remains a highly respected and influential figure in the industry.
